Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not authorize my account to be upgraded to a pro account. I cancelled the subscription. Please refund me.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not want to upgrade and I cancelled right away yet was still charged. Please refund.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did just tried free month, I dont want to keep using the upgrade, please. I want my money back and I do not have the money to pay it

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am not using this account anymore,  
also canva pro has been cancelled (subscription has been cancelled long back) I do not know how this account was charged for upgrading to canva pro, when I did not upgrade it, please make full refund as I did not use any of canva pro features
Reason for canceling subscription: did not use the site for a month. What's next ?: Upgrade to Canva Free

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't want to upgrade to CanvaPro because I can't afford it and I do not use Canva as much as I used to. I'd like a refund please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My son used my card to upgrade to Canva Pro a few weeks ago, and I believed that I canceled the upgrade but I must have done something wrong because yesterday I was charged $119.40. I was wondering if I could please get this refunded?

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I want to upgrade to pro, but I don't have enough so I want a refund the subscription I did yesterday so I can add more money and upgrade to pro.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi. Please can this subscription and issue a refund or upgrade my plan to Pro. I'd like to upgrade to Canva Pro immediately but the option is not available.

Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I forgot to cancel the subscription, but did not want to upgrade to pro. I would like a refund of the subscription please.

Nº da fatura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i paid but did not received the upgrade so i want my money back

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please refund and cancel my Canva pro upgrade, I only meant to take advantage of the free trial

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: If this can not be refunded, can I use the same to upgrade my plan?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t want to upgrade my subscription but some how it did and i was charged. I cancel the subscription as soon as i noticed but i would also like a refund if possible.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: The account upgrading was a mistake and I have yet to use any pro features so I would like a full refund as well as a cancellation of my subscription. Thanks!
